channel.title: Scottie Spinazola's website
channel.description: Recent content on Scottie Spinazola's website

item.title: I am not messing with any sort of gambling anytime soon
item.description: Hello again. Another algorithm, another blog post and a lot of frustrated at basketball moments. When starting this assignment of predicting and gambling on NBA games we first started out with a very simple model. One that just involved three features; turnover percentage, offensive efficiency and a free throw factor. After dealing with that pile of crap I decided to go back to what makes the most sense to me which is making a very balanced algorithm.

item.title: The one true perfect bracket, well at least that's what my mom told me
item.description: So the time has finally come. I am excited and nervous. I feel like I am playing in the tournament but that is far from the truth. I played organized basketball for about three years, I think I scored a handful of baskets. I played before my growth spurt so I think that has a lot to do why I am not playing in college right now and preparing for a long NBA career.

item.title: The Chris Paul Effect
item.description: There is no I in the word team but once or twice or honestly however many you want to say in every generation a player makes you think that maybe it does just come down to one person. Who comes to mind for me is Michael Jordan, Lebron James, Tom Brady, and you can even put Mike Trout in there for making the angels a pretty solid team.

item.title: Who Deserves the Spot in the HOF of the Top Three QBs in the 2004 Draft
item.description: As a Sports fan I do not intend on making this into something that will make people mad or to bring down a players career by nit picking through there career. This is just intended to see that with three careers in my generation that are close and honestly to me seem pretty interesting to see who stat wise would be inducted in canton at the Pro Football Hall of fame.

item.title: I am Scottie Spinazola
item.description: And This is a chance for me to show the talents that I have and show off the side of sports that only sports data can show
